meanings.definition: Sewn together with a needle and thread.
meanings.sent1: The stitched fabric felt smooth against her skin.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stitched dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The stitched teddy bear looked like it was winking.
meanings.sent4: The stitched pieces of the quilt formed a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The stitched seams held the garment together securely.

meanings.sent1: His stitched backpack was ready for the hiking trip.
meanings.sent2: The stitched button on her coat kept it closed.
meanings.sent3: The stitched shoe looked like it had a secret pocket.
meanings.sent4: The stitched book cover protected the pages inside.
meanings.sent5: The stitched hem on the pants prevented them from fraying.
